main

Class ServerInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.ServerInfo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ServerFrame.FrameServerInfo

    public abstract class ServerInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Class mostly static which gives ability to access Server parameters across whole program. Extending class should implement method which changes current parameters.
